body.raw:
{
	"draw": 1,
	"sortedRequest": {
		"pageSize": 50,
		"pageNumber": 1,
		"sortBy": 8200,
		"sortOrder": "asc"
	},
	"instanceId": 1,
	"draftMode": false,
	"filter": {
		"byOutOfBound": null,
		"byMissing": null,
		"byOutOfSync": null,
		"byOverwritten": null,
		"variableId": null,
		"filterColumns": [],
		"filteredValues": {},
		"filteredTextValues": {},
		"variableTypeMap": {
